title: Champion Mastery Grades and ARAM
body:
It's so BS.
So heavily waited on CS, which may be important on Summoners Rift, but not in ARAM.
I'm posting this because I just got an S on Sivir in ARAM, where I really didn't deserve it, where as I have had many ARAM games with other champs where I did (in my opinion) deserve an S, but had low CS, and only got the A+.

I went 19/11/34, in a 22 min game which we lost... but low and behold, I had top CS of 108 (43 higher than anyone else), and get an S.
I did have most dmg dealt to champions, and overall, on team. Most kills on team, and most assists overall.
But I feel it was the CS that earned me the S grade, which seems bullshit.

Why can I not get S when I carry hard with a non CS champ, but I can get S for an average performance with an ADC that CS's well.
Rito plz, ARAM needs separate grading balance from summoners rift.

Yes,** I am **bitching about getting an easy chest, so sue me.
